home.headline: Fresh from Neighbors' backyard üå±
home.subheadline: Buy and sell fresh, locally-grown produce from your neighbors' backyards. Join a hyper-local community working together to reduce waste and expand access to fresh food.

howItWorks.title: How It Works üéØ
howItWorks.subtitle: Join your hyper-local community and start buying, selling, and connecting with neighbors

1.title: Join Your Community
1.description: Sign up and join communities based on your neighborhood, workplace, or frequented spots

2.title: Buy or Sell Produce
2.description: List your excess produce or find fresh items from neighbors using our point system

3.title: Delegate Tasks (Optional)
3.description: Optionally empower your teen or gardener to manage sales and deliveries on your behalf

4.title: Drop-off
4.description: Drop-off produce, take photo of delivery and get paid in points. No awkward meetups...

5.title: Redeem or Donate Points
5.description: Redeem your points for gift cards or donate to local charities and food banks

pointsSection.title: Why Use a Points System?
pointsSection.description: Our closed-loop point system minimizes payment processing fees and keeps more money in your community. Points are available instantly (unlike credit cards that take 2-5 days), making escrow and returns seamless. Buy points once, trade with neighbors, and redeem for gift cards or donate to charity.

safetySection.title: Built for Safety & Convenience
safetySection.description: CasaGrown is designed with features that make buying and selling homegrown produce, simple, safe and rewarding

transaction.title: Transaction Safety & Security
bullets: Built-in escrow system protects buyers and sellers
Drop-off option for safety and convenience
Dispute handling for complete peace of mind

instant.title: Instant Point Availability
instant.description: Unlike credit cards or Venmo which take 2-5 business days to make funds available, CasaGrown points are available immediately upon order completion.
bullets: No waiting periods or banking delays

community.title: Give Back to Your Community
community.description: Turn your backyard surplus into community support by donating points to local charities and food banks.
bullets: Make a difference with every sale

missionSection.title: Why Trade Homegrown?
missionSection.description: We're on a mission to eliminate wastage of food grown in American backyards and expand access to freshly picked produce to many more people.

freshness.title: Incredible Freshness
freshness.description: Fruits in grocery stores often take weeks to months to reach the shelves. CasaGrown connects you with neighbors for produce picked fresh from the tree.

waste.title: Stop Food Waste
waste.description: Over 11.5 billion pounds of backyard produce goes to waste every year. Join us in saving it to feed 28 million people.

inflation.title: Beat Inflation
inflation.description: Earn extra cash from your garden selling homegrown abundance to neighbors, or save money by finding high-quality produce right next door.

teen.title: Teen Opportunity
teen.description: Empower teens to learn business skills and earn pocket money by selling and delivering homegrown produce.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of neighbors already trading homegrown produce. Start saving money, reducing waste, and building community today.

footer.tagline: Connecting communities through sustainable food sharing.

community.title: Join Your Community
community.subtitle: We'll find the nearest landmark to match you with local neighbors
community.howItWorksText: Enter your address, nearby landmark, or business name, and we'll find the closest local community (school, park, mall, or plaza) to match you with neighbors. This keeps trades safe and convenient within your neighborhood.
community.countryAlert: Only available in United States during beta.
community.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission was denied. Please enable location access in your settings.

community.pointsSubtitle: Complete your profile to claim your bonus.

intro.pointsBannerText: Your first post helps neighbors get to know you and kicks off your CasaGrown journey

intro.tip: Tip: Create a fun fact about your garden to introduce yourself!

options.title: More Options
options.description: Find more fresh produce and garden services from people you trust

grow.title: Grow the Community
grow.description: Help build a thriving local marketplace for fresh produce

waste.title: Reduce Waste
waste.description: Help eliminate food waste in your neighborhood together

family.title: Perfect for Families!
family.description: Homeowners: Create accounts for your teenagers to sell your backyard produce. It's an excellent way for them to:

share.hint: Share this link with friends, family, and neighbors in your community

tips.title: üí° Invitation Tips
tips.tip1: Invite neighbors within walking distance for easy drop-off
tips.tip2: Share with local gardening groups and community boards
tips.tip3: Tell them about specific produce you're selling or looking for
tips.tip4: Remind them it's free to join!

delegate.title: Delegate Sales
delegate.subtitle: Manage who can sell on your behalf
delegate.infoBanner: Delegation lets someone you trust (like a teen or gardener) post and sell produce under your account.

addDelegate.title: Add Delegate
addDelegate.headerSubtitle: Generate a link to share with your delegate
addDelegate.noResults: No users found. Try a different name.
addDelegate.howItWorks1: Delegates can create posts and manage sales on your behalf
addDelegate.howItWorks2: You retain full control and can revoke access anytime
addDelegate.howItWorks3: All points earned go to your account
addDelegate.howItWorks4: Delegates cannot access your payment or personal info
addDelegate.howItWorks5: Both parties are notified of all transactions
addDelegate.pointsTip: Great for teens, gardeners, or anyone who helps with your produce!
addDelegate.messagePlaceholder: e.g. Hey, can you help sell my tomatoes?
addDelegate.linkReadyDescription: Share this link with the person who will sell on your behalf.
addDelegate.passcodeHint: If the link doesn't work, they can enter this code in the app.
addDelegate.qrHint: Show this QR code in person for quick setup
addDelegate.shareOnceWarning: This link is single-use. Share it with only one person ‚Äî once accepted, the link expires.
addDelegate.shareMessage: I'd like you to sell produce on my behalf on CasaGrown! {{url}}
addDelegate.inPersonDescription: Generate a 6-digit code for someone nearby to join as your delegate instantly.
addDelegate.showCode: Share this code with the person who will sell for you:

joinByCode.title: Enter Pairing Code
joinByCode.instructions: Enter the 6-digit code shown by the person you'll be selling for.

delegatingFor.role1: Create and manage produce listings on their behalf
delegatingFor.role3: Points earned go to the delegator's account

empty.myDelegatesDescription: Add someone you trust to sell produce on your behalf ‚Äî like a teen or gardener.

delegateInvite.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again or use the code below.
delegateInvite.invitedBy: {{name}} wants you to sell for them
delegateInvite.subtitle: You've been invited to be a delegate on CasaGrown
delegateInvite.heroTitle: {{name}} invited you to be their delegate üå±
delegateInvite.heroSubtitle: Help sell fresh, locally-grown produce on their behalf and join the CasaGrown community.
delegateInvite.benefit1: You'll create and manage listings for {{name}}
delegateInvite.benefit3: Points earned go to their account
delegateInvite.benefit4: Both of you are notified of all activity
delegateInvite.howItWorksSubtitle: It's simple ‚Äî accept the invite, list produce, and help your neighbor sell
delegateInvite.step1Desc: Sign up or log in and accept this delegation invite to get started.
delegateInvite.step2Desc: Create and manage listings for fresh produce on their behalf.
delegateInvite.step3Desc: Manage orders, coordinate drop-offs, and keep things running smoothly.
delegateInvite.step4Desc: Delegates earn money for every sale they make. A great way to earn extra income while helping a neighbor.
delegateInvite.whyBecomeSubtitle: Delegation is a win-win ‚Äî help a neighbor while learning the ropes of local produce trading
delegateInvite.benefitManageDesc: Create posts and manage sales on behalf of {{name}}. Full listing control.
delegateInvite.benefitPrivacyDesc: Their personal info and payment details stay completely private and secure.
delegateInvite.benefitNotifyDesc: Both parties are notified of all transactions, so nothing slips through the cracks.
delegateInvite.benefitPointsDesc: All points earned go to their account. Great for teens helping parents or gardeners.
delegateInvite.manualCodeLabel: Enter this code in the app
delegateInvite.manualCodeHint: Enter this code in the app:

delegateInvite.signupToAccept: Sign Up / Log In to Accept
delegateInvite.getStartedSubtitle: Choose how you'd like to accept this delegation ‚Äî on the web or through the mobile app.
delegateInvite.option1Desc: Sign up or log in to accept this delegation right here in your browser. You'll be paired with the delegator automatically.
delegateInvite.option2Desc: If you already have CasaGrown installed, open the app and enter the pairing code below. You'll be automatically paired with the delegator and can start listing produce immediately.
delegateInvite.codeAutoSaved: Your delegation code has been copied ‚Äî paste it after installing
delegateInvite.downloadPrompt: Download CasaGrown to accept this delegation:
delegateInvite.expiredDescription: This delegation link has expired. Ask the person to send a new one.
delegateInvite.notFoundDescription: This delegation link is invalid or doesn't exist.
delegateInvite.alreadyAcceptedDescription: This delegation has already been accepted.
delegateInvite.iosInstruction: After installing, come back to this page and tap 'Sign Up / Log In to Accept' to auto-accept ‚Äî or enter the pairing code in the app under Delegate Sales ‚Üí Join by Code.
